feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
